ARABIC: فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْبَلَٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But if they turn their backs, you are only responsible for clear transmission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: If they still turn away, your duty is to warn them in clear terms.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But if they turn away, your only duty is to clearly deliver the message of the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), if they turn away, your only duty is to clearly preach to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then if they turn away, O dear Prophet, (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) upon you is nothing but to clearly convey (the message).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then, if they turn away, your duty (O Muhammad) is only to convey (the Message) in a clear way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But if they turn back, then on you devolves only the clear deliverance (of the message).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So, if they turn their backs, thine it is only to deliver the manifest Message.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then, if they turn away, thy duty (O Muhammad) is but plain conveyance (of the message).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But if they turn away, you are responsible only for conveying the message clearly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then if they turn away, on thee is only the preaching plain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But if they turn their backs [on you], your duty is only to communicate in clear terms.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But if they turn away, thy duty is only to preach the clear Message.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, if they turn away, your duty (O Muhammad SAW) is only to convey (the Message) in a clear way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But, if they turn away, your mission is only to give plain warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But if they turn away, your only duty is clear communication.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But if they turn away, [O Muhammad] - then only upon you is [responsibility for] clear notification.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:82] But if they turn away, [if] they reject Islam, your duty, O Muhammad (s), is only to convey [the Message] plainly — this was [revealed] before the command to fight [the disbelievers].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then, if they turn away) from faith, (thy duty (0 Muhammad) is but plain conveyance (of the message)) from Allah in a language that you understand.
